contentrichtext.text: '''ZonePerfect''' is the manufacturer of health food products, known for their [[energy bar|nutrition bar]]s and shakes, created to comply with the [[Zone diet]]. The brand is a part of the Ross Productions Division of [[Abbott Laboratories]] and is commonly available in grocery stores in the United States. Their nutrition bars are available in 15 different flavors, each containing at least 15 grams of [[protein]], while their shakes are available in either vanilla or chocolate and contain 19 grams of protein. The Zone Perfect company is located in [[Columbus, Ohio]]. All ZonePerfect meals are based on the ratio 40:30:30 - in other words, the food they market is 40% carbohydrates, 30% protein and 30% fat. ZonePerfect frequently sponsors competitive events, such as the [[San Francisco Marathon]].<ref>[http://www.ktvu.com/news/9599239/detail.html Results Are In For San Francisco Marathon], KTVU.com</ref> The package claims they are "All-Natural Nutrition Bars", but note that the Chocolate Mint flavored bar contains [[sorbitan monostearate]], an emulsifier with incompletely researched toxicology.<ref>[http://physchem.ox.ac.uk/MSDS/SO/sorbitan_monostearate.html MSDS for sorbitan monostearate], Oxford University</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.zoneperfect.com Zone Perfect official website] * [http://www.ross.com/ Ross Productions Division website] {{Energy bars}} [[Category:Companies based in the Columbus, Ohio metropolitan area]] [[Category:Brand name diet products]] [[Category:Energy food products]] {{food-product-stub}}
